alternative_parents.description: Alkylamines in which the alkyl group is substituted at one carbon atom by an aromatic hydrocarbyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Aralkylamines

alternative_parents.description: Phenols that a unsubstituted at the 2-position.
alternative_parents.name: 1-hydroxy-2-unsubstituted benzenoids

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds in which a hydroxy group, -OH, is attached to a saturated carbon atom R3COH (R not H ).
alternative_parents.name: Tertiary alcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an alkyl chain with an amine group bound to the C1 atom and an alcohol group bound to the C3 atom.
alternative_parents.name: 1,3-aminoalcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a trialkylamine group, characterized by exactly three alkyl groups bonded to the amino nitrogen.
alternative_parents.name: Trialkylamines

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an aliphatic ring substituted with at least one hydroxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Cyclic alcohols and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
class.name: Organooxygen compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as cyclohexanols. These are compounds containing an alcohol group attached to a cyclohexane ring.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing an alcohol group attached to a cyclohexane ring.
direct_parent.name: Cyclohexanols

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing a secondary alcohol functional group, with the general structure HOC(R)(R') (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
intermediate_nodes.name: Secondary alcohols

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds in which at least one hydroxyl functional group (-OH) is bound to a carbon atom, usually connected to other carbon or hydrogen atoms.
subclass.name: Alcohols and polyols

superclass.description: Organic compounds that contain one or more oxygen atoms.
superclass.name: Organic oxygen compounds
